name: Network | DOCSIS | Maximum SIDs
desciption: The maximum number of SIDs has been allocated

en.subject_template: Maximum number of SIDS have been allocated for interface {{interface}}
en.body_template: Maximum number of SIDS have been allocated for interface
en.probable_causes: The maximum number of SIDs has been allocated to the specified line card.
en.recommended_actions: Assign the cable modem to another line card.
